text: Teatro Tenda di Lampugnano was a 5,300-capacity indoor arena in Milan, Italy. It opened in 1983 and was demolished in 1986 when it was replaced by Palatrussardi. It hosted concerts by artists such as Elton John, Sting, U2, James Taylor and Eric Clapton.https://www.setlist.fm/venue/teatro-tenda- lampugnano-milan-italy-bd5e5ce.html ==References== Category:Indoor arenas in Italy Category:Music venues in Italy Category:Sports venues demolished in 1986 Category:Demolished buildings and structures in Italy
title: Teatro Tenda di Lampugnano
